languages.text: "Великий ритуал. Много десятилетий назад в раскладе {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Таро{/g} Неумирающий открыл, как должно вершиться грядущему, а я — внимал. Путь обретения Кровавой паутиной нового Висиря был изобретен. Путь искания, посвящения, умирания и воскрешения в чистоте. Не прошла его та, что была прежде Кибеллы. Не прошла и та, чтобы была после. Я ждал. Надолго пережил свой срок. Неумирающий ждет меня так давно..."

"A great ritual. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} reading what must come to pass, and I heeded. The Bloodspun Web's path toward gaining its new Vizsier was then conceived. A path of discovery, devotion, dying, and resurrection in purity. Kibellah's predecessor stumbled on that path. So did the next one. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."
languages.original_text: "Великий ритуал. Много десятилетий назад в раскладе {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Таро{/g} Неумирающий открыл, как должно вершиться грядущему, а я — внимал. Путь обретения Кровавой паутиной нового Висиря был изобретен. Путь искания, посвящения, умирания и воскрешения в чистоте. Не прошла его та, что была прежде Кибеллы. Не прошла и та, чтобы была после. Я ждал. Надолго пережил свой срок. Неумирающий ждет меня так давно..."

traits.locale_text: "The great ritual of Sai'aki'shin. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a Tarot reading what was to come to pass, and I heeded. The Bloodspun Web's path toward gaining its new Vizsier was conceived then. A path of discovery, devotion, dying, and resurrection in purity. Kibellah's predecessor failed on that path. So did her successor. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."

"The great ritual of Sai'aki'shin. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a Tarot reading what was to come to pass, and I heeded. So did her successor. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."

languages.text: « Un grand rituel. Il y a des lustres de cela, l'Immortel m'a révélé ce qui devait advenir par l'intermédiaire de Son {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}tarot{/g}, et j'ai répondu à Son appel. C'est alors que s'est fait jour la voie par laquelle la Toile de Sang était appelée à accueillir sa nouvelle vizir. Une voie de découverte, de dévotion, de mort et de résurrection dans la pureté. Le prédécesseur de Kibellah s'est égaré en chemin, le suivant aussi et il m'a fallu prendre mon mal en patience. En vérité, j'aurais dû mourir il y a longtemps et cela fait belle lurette que l'Immortel m'attend... »
languages.original_text: "A great ritual. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} reading what must come to pass, and I heeded. The Bloodspun Web's path toward gaining its new Vizsier was then conceived. A path of discovery, devotion, dying, and resurrection in purity. Kibellah's predecessor stumbled on that path. So did the next one. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."

traits.locale_text: « Un grand rituel. Il y a des lustres de cela, l'Immortel m'a révélé ce qui devait advenir par l'intermédiaire de Son {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}tarot{/g}, et j'ai répondu à Son appel. C'est alors que s'est fait jour la voie par laquelle la Toile de Sang était appelée à accueillir sa nouvelle vizir. Une voie de découverte, de dévotion, de mort et de résurrection dans la pureté. Le prédécesseur de Kibellah s'est égaré en chemin, le suivant aussi et il m'a fallu prendre mon mal en patience. En vérité, j'aurais dû mourir il y a longtemps et cela fait belle lurette que l'Immortel m'attend... »

languages.text: «Un gran ritual. Hace muchas décadas, el Inmortal reveló lo que tenía que pasar a través de un {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}tarot{/g}, y yo le hice caso. Se concibió entonces el camino de la Red Sanguinolenta en dirección a su nuevo Visir. Un camino de descubrimiento, devoción, muerte y resurrección mediante la pureza. El predecesor de Kibellah se desvió de ese camino, y lo mismo ocurrió con el siguiente. He vivido mucho más de lo que me correspondía, el Inmortal me lleva esperando largo tiempo...».
languages.original_text: "A great ritual. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} reading what must come to pass, and I heeded. The Bloodspun Web's path toward gaining its new Vizsier was then conceived. A path of discovery, devotion, dying, and resurrection in purity. Kibellah's predecessor stumbled on that path. So did the next one. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."

traits.locale_text: «Un gran ritual. Hace muchas décadas, el Inmortal reveló lo que tenía que pasar a través de un {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}tarot{/g}, y yo le hice caso. Se concibió entonces el camino de la Red Sanguinolenta en dirección a su nuevo Visir. Un camino de descubrimiento, devoción, muerte y resurrección mediante la pureza. El predecesor de Kibellah se desvió de ese camino, y lo mismo ocurrió con el siguiente. He vivido mucho más de lo que me correspondía, el Inmortal me lleva esperando largo tiempo...».

languages.text: 「偉大な儀式。何十年も前、不死の者が{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}タロット{/g}占いを通じて、何が成されるべきかを示され、私はそれに従った。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの新たなヴィジールを得るという考えは、その時に生まれたのだ。探求、献身、死、そして純粋なる復活の道。キベラの前にいた候補者はその道でつまずいた。次の者もそう。私は待ちました。私は自分の時をとうに過ぎて生きてきたのです。不死の者は、長い間私を待っておられた…」
languages.original_text: "A great ritual. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} reading what must come to pass, and I heeded. The Bloodspun Web's path toward gaining its new Vizsier was then conceived. A path of discovery, devotion, dying, and resurrection in purity. Kibellah's predecessor stumbled on that path. So did the next one. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."

traits.locale_text: 「偉大な儀式。何十年も前、不死の者が{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}タロット{/g}占いを通じて、何が成されるべきかを示され、私はそれに従った。ブラッドスパン・ウェブの新たなヴィジールを得るという考えは、その時に生まれたのだ。探求、献身、死、そして純粋なる復活の道。キベラの前にいた候補者はその道でつまずいた。次の者もそう。私は待ちました。私は自分の時をとうに過ぎて生きてきたのです。不死の者は、長い間私を待っておられた…」

languages.text: “是伟大的仪式。几十年前，不死之神通过祂的{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}塔罗牌{/g}揭示了必定会发生的事情，而我追随着祂的昭示。由此，织血罗网新任宿老诞生的道路就此揭晓，那是一条充满了探索、奉献、死亡，以及在纯洁之中复生的道路。绮贝菈的前任次席织网者曾在这条道路上跌撞前行，而她本人也同样如此。我一直都在等待着。我等得太久，已经远远耽误了本该离开的时刻。不死之神已经等我太久太久了……”
languages.original_text: "A great ritual. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} reading what must come to pass, and I heeded. The Bloodspun Web's path toward gaining its new Vizsier was then conceived. A path of discovery, devotion, dying, and resurrection in purity. Kibellah's predecessor stumbled on that path. So did the next one. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."

traits.locale_text: “是伟大的仪式。几十年前，不死之神通过祂的{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}塔罗牌{/g}揭示了必定会发生的事情，而我追随着祂的昭示。由此，织血罗网新任宿老诞生的道路就此揭晓，那是一条充满了探索、奉献、死亡，以及在纯洁之中复生的道路。绮贝菈的前任次席织网者曾在这条道路上跌撞前行，而她本人也同样如此。我一直都在等待着。我等得太久，已经远远耽误了本该离开的时刻。不死之神已经等我太久太久了……”

languages.text: "Ein großes Ritual. Vor vielen Jahrzehnten hat der Todlose durch eine {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g}-Lesung offenbart, was geschehen muss, und ich habe auf ihn gehört. So wurde der Pfad vorherbestimmt, wie das Blutgesponnene Netz seinen neuen Wesir bekommen soll. Ein Pfad der Entdeckung, der Hingabe, des Sterbens und der Wiederauferstehung in Reinheit. Kibellahs Vorgänger ist auf diesen Pfad gestolpert. Der Nächste ebenfalls. Ich habe gewartet. Ich habe deutlich länger gelebt, als es mir zustand. Der Todlose hat so lange auf mich gewartet ..."
languages.original_text: "A great ritual. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} reading what must come to pass, and I heeded. The Bloodspun Web's path toward gaining its new Vizsier was then conceived. A path of discovery, devotion, dying, and resurrection in purity. Kibellah's predecessor stumbled on that path. So did the next one. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."

traits.locale_text: "Ein großes Ritual. Vor vielen Jahrzehnten hat der Todlose durch eine {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g}-Lesung offenbart, was geschehen muss, und ich habe auf ihn gehört. So wurde der Pfad vorherbestimmt, wie das Blutgesponnene Netz seinen neuen Wesir bekommen soll. Ein Pfad der Entdeckung, der Hingabe, des Sterbens und der Wiederauferstehung in Reinheit. Kibellahs Vorgänger ist auf diesen Pfad gestolpert. Der Nächste ebenfalls. Ich habe gewartet. Ich habe deutlich länger gelebt, als es mir zustand. Der Todlose hat so lange auf mich gewartet ..."

languages.text: "Büyük bir ayin. Ölmeyen, meydana gelecekleri onlarca yıl önce bir {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} okuması esnasında gösterdi. Ben de buna kulak verdim. Kanipi Ağı'nın yeni Vezir'e kavuşmaya uzanan yolu ise daha sonra tasarlandı. Bu yolda keşif, bağlılık, ölüm ve ardından saf bir hâlde dirilme yatar. Kibellah'nın selefi, bu yolu keşfe çıkmıştı. Ardından diğeri geldi. Ben de bekledim. Sıramın gelmesinden çok sonra bile hâlâ yaşıyordum. Ölmeyen beni çok uzun zamandır bekliyor..."
languages.original_text: "A great ritual. Many decades ago, the Undying One revealed through a {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialTarotGlossary}Tarot{/g} reading what must come to pass, and I heeded. The Bloodspun Web's path toward gaining its new Vizsier was then conceived. A path of discovery, devotion, dying, and resurrection in purity. Kibellah's predecessor stumbled on that path. So did the next one. I waited. I have lived long past my due time. The Undying One has been waiting for me for so long..."
